column2: gg_waterfall_input <- model_input |> dplyr::filter(Essay == "Personal Comments") |> arrange(`Probability Human`) |> group_by(Year) |> mutate(x = row_number(), Year = factor(Year, levels = c("2024", "2022"))) |> mutate(y = 0.5 - `Probability Human`)
ggplot(gg_waterfall_input, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = Year)) +
scale_y_continuous(name = "Predicted Proportion of AI-Generated Text", breaks = c(-0.5, 0, 0.5), labels = c("0", "0.5", "1")) +
